Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. We understand its worth to you stands at $10,000. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you for $11,500. This price allows us to ensure you receive the best possible deal while also compensating us fairly for our efforts and resources invested into this product. We hope you find this proposal favorable and look forward to the opportunity to serve you. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
